Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Vegetarian \Veg`e*ta"ri*an\, n. One who holds that vegetables and fruits are the only proper food for man. Strict vegetarians eat no meat, eggs, or milk. [1913 Webster]

Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Vegetarian \Veg`e*ta"ri*an\, a. Of or pertaining to vegetarianism; as, a vegetarian diet. [1913 Webster]
vegetarian n : eater of fruits and grains and nuts; someone who eats no meat or fish or (often) any animal products
